original_text: You are only a small group of people, but do not be afraid. Your Father God has given his kingdom to you. He is happy to do that.
korean_text: 적은 무리여 무서워 말라 너희 아버지께서 그 나라를 너희에게 주시기를 기뻐하시느니라

sentences.original_text: You are only a small group of people
Your Father God has given his kingdom to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 아버지 하나님께서 그 나라를 너희에게 주셨다

sentences.original_text: He is happy to do that
